rows.label: tev001792_MSG0001
rows.name:
Good evening, [ST:playername ].
What a surprise to see you here![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001792_MSG0002
rows.name: I'm actually waiting to meet someone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001792_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev001792_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Hope who she's waiting to meet.

rows.label: tev001792_JNK0020
rows.name: Apologize

rows.label: tev001792_SEL0021
rows.name: Say that you're sorry for arriving late.

rows.label: tev001792_MSG0003
rows.name: Are you that curious?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001792_MSG0004
rows.name: Well, it's just Ada. We're going shopping together.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001792_MSG0005
rows.name:
She insisted that I refuse to counsel anyone on my day
off, and instead focus the time on myself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001792_MSG0006
rows.name: Oh no! We had an appointment to meet today?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001792_MSG0007
rows.name: Oh dear. I didn't see that on my schedule.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001792_MSG0008
rows.name:
It must have completely slipped my mind.
I am so terribly sorry![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001792_MSG0009
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001792_MSG0010
rows.name:
You're lying, aren't you?
Don't be a jerk![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001792_MSG0011
rows.name: ...Anyway, I'm here to have a little fun with Ada.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001792_MSG0012
rows.name:
She's going to take me shopping for clothes, and
then maybe to pick up some fertilizer for my flowers.
After that, she's promised to buy me dinner.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001792_JNK0110
rows.name: Encourage

rows.label: tev001792_SEL0111
rows.name: Tell Hope to have a wonderful time.

rows.label: tev001792_JNK0120
rows.name: Discourage

rows.label: tev001792_SEL0121
rows.name:
Ask Hope if she really thinks she'll be able
to pull off all that shopping in one day.

rows.label: tev001792_JNK0130
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev001792_SEL0131
rows.name: Ask Hope what she's having for dinner.

rows.label: tev001792_MSG0013
rows.name:
Thank you. I hope everything goes well and we have
a lovely evening.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001792_MSG0014
rows.name:
Ada has promised that we'll be dining on the finest
steak in New LA, so it would be rude of me not to
try and thoroughly enjoy it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001792_MSG0015
rows.name: I will strive to be as uninhibited as I possibly can![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001792_MSG0016
rows.name:
I'm not exactly confident it will go as planned either,
but I don't know why you need to put it so harshly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001792_MSG0017
rows.name:
Honestly, I fear I'll end up meeting someone in need
and feel obligated to help them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001792_MSG0018
rows.name:
I don't mind doing that sort of thing, but it annoys
poor Ada to no end. It would certainly make for an
awkward evening if it were to happen.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001792_MSG0019
rows.name: Apparently, we'll be having steak.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001792_MSG0020
rows.name:
Ada says she received an unexpected reward for a
mission she completed, and is in the mood to splurge.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001792_MSG0021
rows.name:
I feel terrible that she's wasting it on me,
but I'll suck it up and enjoy it as best I'm able.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001792_MSG0022
rows.name:
After all, no one knows better than I that true joy
comes from bringing happiness to others.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001792_MSG0023
rows.name: And I mustn't deny her that, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001792_MSG0024
rows.name:
Ah, that's Ada over there. I should be going.
I look forward to working with you again soon![ST:wait ]
